about_the_game:
Join our Discord server to stay up to date with all updates and fixes related to our game. Here you can find new friends and play together. We greatly value our community, which is why our Discord server plays an important role for us. Most of the ideas for the game are born thanks to the server members. Become a part of our community and follow our projects along with us!

Last Frontier is a multiplayer cooperative horror game set on the battlefields of World War II, created using Unreal Engine 5.

As a result of genetic experiments conducted by one side of the conflict, mutants have overrun the combat zones. You will play as a team of medics dispatched on a secret mission to cleanse the area after a fierce battle.

The team's main objective is to create an antidote capable of destroying the mutant that is wreaking havoc on the battlefield. To do this, players must burn mutated rats and other monsters in a bonfire to extract the necessary antidote concentrate using a special device. Coordinated teamwork and tactical interaction are the keys to victory in this dark and intense adventure.

  • Your Objective
    Your task is to destroy mutated creatures and create an antidote. Working together, the team must search for key ingredients to create the antidote—some of which may be alive and dangerous. Burn the mutants at the bonfire to complete the process and win.

  • Increasing Difficulty
    As the game progresses, mutants become stronger and faster, and their numbers increase. Mutated creatures will try to stop you from completing the mission. The team's only defense is the gas torch, which helps them fend off the approaching monsters.

  • Replayability
    The locations of doors, key items, and mutants are randomly generated in each session, making every game unique. The mutants' AI is unpredictable, forcing players to carefully plan every move.

  • Player Progression
    For successfully completing missions, players earn experience, increasing their rank and gaining upgrade points. These bonuses will help you defeat enemies faster and survive in the most dangerous conditions.

  • In-game Voice Chat: Use the in-game voice chat to coordinate with friends or find other players through the server browser. The game features Voice Chat, allowing you to communicate and organize actions with your team in real-time.

  • Inventory: Manage resources with the inventory, which lets you collect and use items necessary for completing tasks.

  • Reviving Players: The game provides the ability to revive players who are bleeding out, adding an element of interaction and strategic planning to team gameplay.

  • Tactical Interaction: Work together with your team to efficiently utilize available resources and complete missions.

name: Last Frontier

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Stable internet connection and SSD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Stable internet connection

short_description: Last Frontier is a cooperative horror game where a team of medics fights against World War II mutants. Players must burn mutated creatures using a gas torch to collect ingredients for creating an antidote.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Turkish, Japanese
